progressivestages.quest.required_stage.t: If set, this quest is hidden until the player has this stage. Leave empty for no requirement. Example: iron_age or progressivestages:diamond_age
progressivestages.chapter.required_stage: If set, this entire chapter is hidden until the player has this stage. Leave empty for no requirement. Example: iron_age or progressivestages:diamond_age
